MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Rosevale Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.26pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are our engineers are continuing to investigate the cause affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.34pm on 22nd January 2021.
